revised_title: Obituary of Robert Hunt and Robert Cornelis, Lord Napier of Magdala
tldr: This article is an obituary for two notable figures in their respective fields: Robert Hunt, a pioneer in photographic chemistry, and Robert Cornelis, Lord Napier of Magdala, a distinguished military engineer and commander. Hunt made significant contributions to the development of photography and authored a well-known manual on the subject. Lord Napier of Magdala served in various capacities in the British military, including commanding the Abyssinian expedition, and held several high-ranking positions throughout his career.
